mono.usage: Code Snippets, AI Prompts, Data Labels

cards.base: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-white/5 bg-[#121212] p-8 transition-all duration-500 hover:border-white/10 hover:bg-[#18181B]

buttons.primary: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white px-8 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-black transition-transform hover:scale-105 hover:bg-white/90 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white/20
buttons.secondary: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-transparent px-8 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-white transition-colors hover:bg-white/10 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white/20
buttons.ghost: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground transition-colors hover:text-white

inputs.minimal: flex h-12 w-full rounded-none border-b border-white/20 bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-white focus:outline-none disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

hero_background.alt: Abstract wavy lines representing neural pathways
hero_background.usage: Hero Section Background with heavy opacity/blur

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'reactflow' for the mind map visualization.
Install 'framer-motion' for animations if not present.
Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the provided font families (Playfair Display, Manrope, JetBrains Mono). You may need to import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
Update 'tailwind.config.js' colors to match the 'colors.palette' object exactly.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Keep them thin and minimal (stroke-width={1.5}).
Implement the 'Mind Map' as a central navigation hub.
Ensure 'Dark Mode' is the DEFAULT and ONLY mode. Hardcode the dark theme class on the body or HTML tag.
Do not use standard HTML selects or date pickers. Use Shadcn UI components styled to match the dark theme.
For the 'Reflection Journal', use localStorage. Create a clean, distraction-free writing interface.
Use the provided image URLs as subtle backgrounds with low opacity (10-20%) to maintain readability.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
